short_summary: HI-6 Dimethanesulfonate Lyophilized Powder for Solution
description: HI-6 DMS is a toxic agent used to treat suspected exposure to nerve agents. The Department of National Defence requires purchase and supply of HI-6 DMS in vials. HI-6 DMS is a lyophilized powder for solution. The project involves manufacturing and supply of HI-6 DMS drug product as a sterile lyophilized powder for solution. The requirement is for a 20 mL vial at a concentration of 100 mg/mL after reconstitution with 10 mL of diluent or water for injection. The product must meet Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) guidelines of the Canadian Food and Drug Regulations. The contract value is approximately $5,400,000.
duration_in_months: time frame of the contract is from contract award to 31 March 2024 with the irrevocable option to extend the Contract for up to five (5) one-year option periods.
